name: Shaping Perspectives- A
who_you_serve: The target audience includes individuals struggling with body image issues, dieting, and those seeking food freedom and self-acceptance.
what_you_do: Shaping Perspectives helps individuals heal from diet culture and embrace body confidence through intuitive eating and self-care practices.
business_focus: Shaping Perspectives helps individuals heal from diet culture and embrace body confidence through intuitive eating and self-care practices.
